metamask.title: Metamask
metamask.lockedMessage: Metamask is locked. Please unlock it and try again.
metamask.loginMessage: You can login with Metamask. It will manage private keys for you. No extra password needed.
metamask.notAvailable: Metamask is not available. You need to install Metamask browser extension to use this feature.
metamask.unlockForTransaction: Please make sure Metamask is unlocked to send transaction with account.

buy.title: Buy from Transak
buy.description: You can buy ETH/DAI from Transak, directly to your Matic wallet.

deposit.title: Deposit from Mainnet
deposit.description: Deposit ETH/DAI from your Ethereum wallet to Matic wallet to get ETH/DAI on Matic

transfer.title: Transfer from another wallet
transfer.description: You can transfer ETH/DAI to your wallet if you have ETH/DAI in another Matic wallet.

empty.title: Oops! No item found on Ethereum chain.
empty.description: We didn’t find any collectibles on Ethereum chain.

empty.title: Oops! No item found on Matic chain.
empty.description: We didn’t find any collectibles on Matic chain.

searchNotFound.title: No search results found
searchNotFound.description: We can't seem to find any tokens that matches your search

empty.title: Oops! No activities found.
empty.description: We didn’t find any activities record.

logout.title: Logout
logout.logoutQuestion: Are you sure want to logout?

invalid.owner: You are no owner of this token

process.checkpointWait: Waiting for checkpoint ... Will take ~34 minutes
process.checkpointed: Checkpoint completed. Please complete the Withdraw now.
process.posCheckpointed: Checkpoint completed. Please finish the withdraw process now.
process.challengeWait: Waiting for challenge period to end. Please check back after {challengePeriod}
process.challengeEnd: Challenge period ended. Please finish the withdraw process.

preventUserDepositModalClose: Please stay on this page until the deposit transaction is confirmed on Ethereum
preventUserWithdrawModalClose: Please stay on this page until the withdraw transaction is confirmed on Ethereum

process.preDeposit: Please confirm the transaction to complete the deposit.
process.depositing: Transactions on Ethereum sometimes take longer based on network congestion. Please wait or increase the gas price
process.deposited: It will take ~7-8 minutes for the NFT's to get deposited to your account.
